entry.title: Making fancy visualizations of CAD construction sequences

link.title: Making fancy visualizations of CAD construction sequences

entry.content:
The lucky few who attended my thesis defense will have been blown away by my schematic animations illustrating the topology of computer-aided design representations. I actually created a couple of Blender modifiers to make this quite easy for myself (and hopefully, others in the future)â€”which can be applied to any mesh, with minimal manual intervention.

Links and additional info will be forthcoming.
entry.summary: How did I make those pretty animations in my thesis talk? I provide some tools to make this easy in Blender.
